#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,q,a,b;
    cin>>n;
    int h[n+1];
    for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
        cin>>h[i];
    cin>>q;
    while(q--)
    {  int flag=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        for(int i=a+1;i<b;i++)
        {
            if(h[i]>h[a])
            {
              flag=1;
              cout<<"NO"<<endl;
              break;
            }
        }
     if(flag==0)
            cout<<"YES"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
